# Security Policy

## Supported Version

| **Version** | **Minecraft Java Version (Target)** | **Support** |
|:---:|:---:|:---:|
| 5.0.0 | 1.16 | ✔ |
| 4.0.0 | 1.15.2 | ✔ |
| < 4.0.0 |  | ❌ |

## Report Vulnerability

Submit the issue via [GitHub](https://github.com/hugoalh/Minecraft.Java.DataPack.RecipePlus/issues).
